subject: Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Shaquille O’Neal apologized for calling the Kings “the Queens” a decade ago and said he saw no conflict of interest with his job as an analyst on the TNT program “Inside the N.B.A.”
snippet: Shaquille O’Neal apologized for calling the Kings “the Queens” a decade ago and said he saw no conflict of interest with his job as an analyst on the TNT program “Inside the N.B.A.”
